fields.description:
Exists in 1.5.1 and 1.6.0

# have a network that has a bad connection, but is available
# background app, then launch it again

results: intermittant deadlock (see log and console attached)
fields.summary: iOS: Queued analytics on a bad network connection can result in a deadlock

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed, lack of information and lack of progress. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
